Credit Line: Brooklyn Museum Costume Collection at The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Gift of the Brooklyn Museum, 2009; A. Augustus Healy Fund, 1926
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: Central Europe and Low Countries, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: The lively embroidery employed in this Bavarian cap, combined with glittering bugle beads creates a striking effect. Because of the strain placed on them during wear, original ribbons are rare for this type of hat making it particularly special.
